result.purpose: Responsible for providing client functionalities and data structures for interacting with a relay service for blockchain operations.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client logic and data models related to relay services.

internal/infras/relay/client.go.purpose: Defines a client for interacting with a relay service for blockchain operations.

internal/infras/relay/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for handling relay operations and token transactions.
